name: Pong (itch) (Sloth)
description:
Hello and welcome to my first ever game development project! I had a lot of help to get it to where it is now, and when I started the project I was just happy that it ran at all.

anyways! the controls are simple and the game can be played on one keyboard.

Player 1: 

Up - W

Down - S

Pause - Escape

Player 2:

Up - Up Arrow

Down - Down Arrow
